relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucus membranes moist
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation b/l, No W/R/R
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, appropriately TTP and minimally distended
relevant_findings.wounds: Bandages intact with minimal serosanguineous drainage, no surrounding erythema
relevant_findings.extremities: No ___ edema, ___ warm and well perfused
